scripts.start:en: concurrently -n mock-backend,assets,angular "docker run --rm -p 8080:80 --name phonebook-backend-mock tsystemsmms/phonebook-build:mock-backend" "docker run --rm -p 8081:80 --name phonebook-assets tsystemsmms/phonebook-build:assets" "ng serve --ssl --proxy-config proxy.conf.json --configuration en"
scripts.start:de: concurrently -n mock-backend,assets,angular "docker run --rm -p 8080:80 --name phonebook-backend-mock tsystemsmms/phonebook-build:mock-backend" "docker run --rm -p 8081:80 --name phonebook-assets tsystemsmms/phonebook-build:assets" "ng serve --ssl --proxy-config proxy.conf.json --configuration de"
scripts.start-compose: npm run compose-build && docker-compose run --rm --service-ports angular npm run start:en
scripts.start-compose:debug: npm run compose-build && docker-compose run --rm --service-ports angular npm run start:debug
scripts.test-docker: npm run docker-build && docker run --rm build_phonebook npm run test
scripts.test-compose:dev: npm run compose-build && docker-compose run --rm --service-ports angular npm run test:dev
scripts.e2e-docker: npm run docker-build && docker run --rm build_phonebook npm run e2e
scripts.build: npm run build:en && npm run build:de
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:de && npm run build:en
scripts.build-docker:prod: docker build -t phonebook . && docker run --rm phonebook:latest
scripts.build-compose:dev: npm run compose-build && docker-compose run --rm --service-ports nginx
scripts.extract-i18n: ng xi18n --i18nFormat xlf --output-path i18n --i18n-locale en && ngx-extractor --input src/**/*.ts --format xlf --outFile src/i18n/messages.xlf && node src/i18n/remove-context.js src/i18n/messages.xlf && xliffmerge --profile xliffmerge.json && cd src/i18n && node ./generateTestTranslations.js
scripts.compose:debug: npm run compose-build && docker-compose run --rm --service-ports angular bash
